snippet.title: CROPSMARE! Trailer
snippet.description:
CROPSMARE! is a sokoban-like puzzle game inspired by Adventures of Lolo.

It's an extended version of the game I made last year for GBJAM10: it features 64 unique levels, new mechanics and a revamped UI.

Play the original jam version for free on your browser here*: 
https://mrkdji.itch.io/gbjam10

*: you won't be able to transfer your progress to the extended version

CROPSMARE! is 25% off on itch.io as a special release discount:   
https://mrkdji.itch.io/cropsmare


Find my other games on itch:
https://mrkdji.itch.io/


Subscribe to the channel if you want to keep updated with my following releases, or follow me on:
https://twitter.com/mrkdji
https://mastodon.gamedev.place/@mrkdji 
https://www.instagram.com/mrkdji/
